entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
